trans-unit.source: A DKIM selector usually looks like 12345.domain. It must match the name of your DNS record.
trans-unit.target: Un selector DKIM are de obicei forma 12345.domeniu. Trebuie sa coincida cu numele inregistrării DNS.

trans-unit.source: A category root is where a category tree can begin. This is used with multistore.
trans-unit.target: O categorie radacina este locul de unde poate incepe un arbore de categorii. Aceasta categorie este folosita pentru magazine multiple.

trans-unit.source: All outdated sessions will be automatically cleared after the first connection attempt, but you can do it manually now if needed.
trans-unit.target: Toate sesiunile expirate vor fi sterse automat dupa prima incercare de conectare, dar aici o poti face manual, daca este nevoie.

trans-unit.source: Allow or deny this employee's access to the Admin panel.
trans-unit.target: Permite/interzice accesul acestui angajat la panoul de administrare.

trans-unit.source: Allowed formats: .csv, .xls, .xlsx, .xlst, .ods, .ots
trans-unit.target: Formate permise: .csv, .xls, .xlsx, .xlst, .ods, .ots

trans-unit.source: Allows you to declare if your cookie should be restricted to a first-party or same-site context.
trans-unit.target: Permite restrictionarea cookie-urilor la un context first-party sau same-site.

trans-unit.source: At the top of the screen, please select the "Import" tab
trans-unit.target: Din partea de sus a ecranului se selecteaza tabul "Import"

trans-unit.source: Back office pages require the use of a token. This protection can be disabled if needed.
trans-unit.target: Paginile de administrare vor cere utilizarea unui jeton. Aceasta protectie poate fi dezactivata la nevoie.

trans-unit.source: Before activating the webservice, you must be sure to:
trans-unit.target: Inainte de a activa serviciul web, trebuie sa te asiguri ca:

trans-unit.source: Before choosing "Yes", check that PHP is not configured as an Apache module on your server.
trans-unit.target: Inainte de a alege "Da", verifica daca PHP nu este configurat pe server ca modul Apache.

trans-unit.source: CCC allows you to reduce the loading time of your page. With these settings you will gain performance without even touching the code of your theme. Make sure, however, that your theme is compatible with PrestaShop 1.7+. Otherwise, CCC will cause problems.
trans-unit.target: CCC te ajuta sa reduci timpul de incarcare al paginii. Cu aceste setari vei castiga performanta fara ca macar sa atingi codul temei. Asigura-te, totusi, ca tema folosita este compatibila cu PrestaShop 1.7+, altfel CCC va crea probleme.

trans-unit.source: Check that URL rewriting is available on this server.
trans-unit.target: Verifica daca rescrierea adreselor URL este disponibila pe acest server.

trans-unit.source: Check that the six methods GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE and HEAD are supported by this server.
trans-unit.target: Verifica daca cele sase metode GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE si HEAD sunt acceptate de acest server.

trans-unit.source: Check the IP address of the cookie in order to prevent your cookie from being stolen.
trans-unit.target: Verifica adresa IP a cookie-ului pentru evitarea furtului de cookie.

trans-unit.source: Check the backup integrity: Look for errors, incomplete file, etc... Be sure to verify all of your data.
trans-unit.target: Verifica integritatea copiei de siguranta: cauta existenta erorilor, a fisierelor incomplete, etc. Fii sigur ca ai verificat toate datele.

trans-unit.source: Check the maximum filesize allowed (e.g. Max: 16MB)
trans-unit.target: Verifica dimensiunea maxima permisa pentru incarcarea unui fisier (de exp. Max.: 16 Mo)

trans-unit.source: Choose "No" to disable Customer Groups.
trans-unit.target: Alege "Nu" pentru a dezactiva grupurile de clienti.

trans-unit.source: Choose "No" to disable Product Combinations.
trans-unit.target: Alege "Nu" pentru a dezactiva combinatiile produselor.

trans-unit.source: Choose "No" to disable Product Features.
trans-unit.target: Alege "Nu" pentru a dezactiva caracteristicile produselor.

trans-unit.source: Click "%add_new_label%".
trans-unit.target: Fa clic pe "%add_new_label%".

trans-unit.source: Click here to display the URLs of the %name% shop
trans-unit.target: Fa clic aici pentru a afisa adresele URL ale magazinului %name%

trans-unit.source: Click here to display the list of shop groups
trans-unit.target: Da clic aici pentru a afisa lista grupurilor de magazine

trans-unit.source: Click here to display the shops in the %name% shop group
trans-unit.target: Fa clic aici pentru a afisa magazinele din grupul %name%

trans-unit.source: Click on "None" to disable log alerts by email or enter the recipients of these emails in the following field.
trans-unit.target: Fa clic pe "Niciunul" pentru a dezactiva alertele prin e-mail sau introdu destinatarii acestor alerte in caseta urmatoare.

trans-unit.source: Click on the "%phpmyadmin_browse_label%" button and select the backup file from your hard drive.
trans-unit.target: Fa clic pe butonul "%phpmyadmin_browse_label%" si alege copia de siguranta de pe hard disk.

trans-unit.source: Click on the "%phpmyadmin_go_label%" button and please wait patiently for the import process to conclude. This may take several minutes.
trans-unit.target: Fa clic pe butonul "%phpmyadmin_go_label%" si asteapta pana se finalizeaza importul. Ai rabdare, poate dura mai multe minute.

trans-unit.source: Connect to "phpMyAdmin" and select your current database.
trans-unit.target: Conecteaza-te la "phpMyAdmin" si selecteaza baza ta de date curenta.

trans-unit.source: Define the upload limit for a downloadable product (in megabytes). This value has to be lower or equal to the maximum file upload allotted by your server (currently: %size% MB).
trans-unit.target: Stabileste limita de marime pentru produsele descarcabile (in MB). Aceasta valoare trebuie sa fie mai mica sau egala cu limita de marime definita de serverul tau pentru un fisier la incarcare (limita curenta: %size% MB).

trans-unit.source: Define the upload limit for an image (in megabytes). This value has to be lower or equal to the maximum file upload allotted by your server (currently: %size% MB).
trans-unit.target: Stabileste limita de marime pentru o imagine (in MB). Aceasta valoare trebuie sa fie mai mica sau egala cu limita de marime definita de serverul tau pentru incarcarea unui fisier (limita curenta: %size% MB).

trans-unit.source: Download the backup from the list below or from your FTP server (in the folder "admin/backups").
trans-unit.target: Descarca copia de siguranta din lista de mai jos sau via FTP (in dosarul "admin/backups").

trans-unit.source: Drop existing tables during import.
trans-unit.target: Renunta la tabelele curente in timpul importului.

trans-unit.source: Enable DKIM, fill in the fields and give it a try. If no email is sent, check logs.
trans-unit.target: Activeaza DKIM, completeaza campurile si fa un test. Daca nu este trimis niciun e-mail, verifica jurnalele.

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable debug mode. Debug mode will enable extended error reporting, display the Symfony debug bar, and other features.
trans-unit.target: Activeaza/dezactiveaza modul de depanare. Modul de depanare va afisa bara de depanare Symfony, va activa rapoarte de eroare extinse si alte facilitati.

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable debug profiling. Debug profiling will display performance-related information under each page and help find performance bottlenecks in your store.
trans-unit.target: Activeaza/dezactiveaza profilarea pentru depanare. Profilarea va afisa informatii legate de performanta la sfarsitul fiecarei pagini si va ajuta la gasirea gatuiturilor ce afecteaza performanta magazinului.

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable the migrated attribute page.
trans-unit.target: Activeaza/dezactiveaza pagina migrata a atributelor.

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable the migrated carriers page.
trans-unit.target: Activeaza/dezactiveaza pagina migrata a transportatorilor.

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable the migrated cart rules page.
trans-unit.target: Activeaza/dezactiveaza pagina migrata a regulilor de cos.

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable the migrated catalog price rules page.
trans-unit.target: Activeaza/dezactiveaza pagina migrata a regulilor de catalog.

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable the migrated countries page.
trans-unit.target: Activeaza/dezactiveaza pagina migrata a tarilor.

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable the migrated customer threads page.
trans-unit.target: Activeaza/dezactiveaza pagina migrata a discutiilor cu clientii.

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable the migrated order states page.
trans-unit.target: Activeaza/dezactiveaza pagina migrata a stadiilor de comenzi.

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable the migrated permissions page.
trans-unit.target: Activeaza/dezactiveaza pagina migrata a permisiunilor.

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable the migrated states page.
trans-unit.target: Activeaza/dezactiveaza pagina migrata a judetelor/comitatelor.

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable the migrated tax rules page.
trans-unit.target: Activeaza/dezactiveaza pagina migrata a regulilor de taxare.

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable the migrated titles page.
trans-unit.target: Activeaza/dezactiveaza pagina migrata a modurilir de adresare.

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable this shop group?
trans-unit.target: Acest grup de magazine este activ?

trans-unit.source: Enable this option to keep your imported items’ ID number as is. Otherwise, PrestaShop will ignore them and create auto-incremented ID numbers.
trans-unit.target: Activeaza aceasta optiune pentru a importa numerele de identificare (ID) ale articolelor importate asa cum sunt in fisierul de import. Altfel, PrestaShop le va ignora si va crea propriile numere de identificare incrementate automat.

trans-unit.source: Enabling multi-statements queries increases the risk of SQL injection vulnerabilities being exploited.
trans-unit.target: Activarea interogarilor cu instructiuni multiple mareste riscul aparitiei vulnerabilitatilor de tip injectie SQL.

trans-unit.source: Error
trans-unit.target: Eroare

trans-unit.source: Fabulous
trans-unit.target: Fabulos

trans-unit.source: Fill in the fields and click "%save_label%".
trans-unit.target: Completeaza formularul si fa clic pe "%save_label%".

trans-unit.source: Fill in the fields below to set up DKIM signing of outgoing emails. This will reduce the likelihood of your emails being marked as spam. You can get the data below from your server administrator or generate it yourself by using one of the freely available tools, such as dkimcore.org. Also, make sure that your server is registered as an authorized sender in your SPF record.
trans-unit.target: Completeaza campurile de mai jos pentru a configura autentificarea DKIM pentru e-mailurile trimise. Aceasta va reduce probabilitatea ca e-mailurile tale sa fie marcate ca spam. Poti obtine datele de mai jos de la administratorul serverului sau le poti genera singur, folosind unul dintre instrumentele disponibile gratuit, cum ar fi dkimcore.org. In plus, asigura-te ca serverul tau este inregistrat ca expeditor autorizat in inregistrarea SPF.

trans-unit.source: Fully qualified domain name (keep this field empty if you don't know).
trans-unit.target: Nume domeniu calificat complet (se lasa gol daca nu se cunoaste).

trans-unit.source: Good
trans-unit.target: Buna

trans-unit.source: How do I create a new SQL query?
trans-unit.target: Cum creez o noua interogare SQL?

trans-unit.source: How to restore a database backup in 10 easy steps
trans-unit.target: Cum se restaureaza in 10 pasi usori o copie de siguranta a unei baze de date

trans-unit.source: IP address or server name (e.g. smtp.mydomain.com).
trans-unit.target: Adresa IP sau nume server (de ex. smtp.domeniu.ro).

trans-unit.source: If enabled, the backup script will drop your tables prior to restoring data. (ie. "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS")
trans-unit.target: Daca este activat, acest script va sterge complet tabelele inaintea restaurarii datelor. (de ex. "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS")

trans-unit.source: If enabled, the product's reference number MUST be unique!
trans-unit.target: Daca este activa, codul de referinta al produsului TREBUIE sa fie unic!

trans-unit.source: If you set this URL as the Main URL for the selected shop, all URLs set to this shop will be redirected to this URL (you can only have one Main URL per shop).
trans-unit.target: Daca setezi acest URL ca URL principal pentru magazinul selectat, toate URL-urile setate pentru acest magazin vor fi redirectionate catre acest URL (poti avea doar un singur URL principal pentru un magazin).

trans-unit.source: If you want to add a virtual URL, you need to activate URL rewriting on your web server and enable Friendly URL option.
trans-unit.target: In cazul in care doresti adaugarea unei adrese URL virtuala, trebuie activata rescrierea adreselor URL pe server si trebuie activata optiunea Adrese URL prietenoase.

trans-unit.source: If your backup file exceeds this limit, contact your hosting provider for assistance.
trans-unit.target: Daca fisierul tau de backup depaseste aceasta limita, contacteaza furnizorul de gazduire pentru asistenta.

trans-unit.source: Ignore this field if you don't use the Multistore tool. If you leave this field empty, the default store will be used.
trans-unit.target: Ignora acest camp daca nu folosesti functia Multi-magazin. Daca nu completezi acest camp, va fi folosit magazinul implicit.

trans-unit.source: Informative only
trans-unit.target: Doar informativ

trans-unit.source: Invalid
trans-unit.target: Incorect

trans-unit.source: Leave blank if not applicable.
trans-unit.target: Se lasa gol daca nu este aplicabil.

trans-unit.source: Log alerts will be sent to these emails. Please use a comma to separate them (e.g. pub@prestashop.com, anonymous@psgdpr.com).
trans-unit.target: Alertele vor fi trimise catre aceste adrese de e-mail. Foloseste o virgula pentru a le separa (de ex. pub@prestashop.com, anonymous@psgdpr.com).

trans-unit.source: Major issue (crash)!
trans-unit.target: Problema majora (fatala)!

trans-unit.source: Name of the fourth domain of your shop, (e.g. myshop-media-server-3.com). If you do not have another domain, leave this field blank.
trans-unit.target: Numele celui de al doilea domeniu al magazinului, (de ex. magazinul-meu-media-server-3.ro). Daca nu ai un alt domeniu, lasa campul gol.

trans-unit.source: Name of the second domain of your shop, (e.g. myshop-media-server-1.com). If you do not have another domain, leave this field blank.
trans-unit.target: Numele celui de al doilea domeniu al magazinului, (de ex. magazinul-meu-media-server-1.ro). Daca nu ai un alt domeniu, lasa campul gol.

trans-unit.source: Name of the third domain of your shop, (e.g. myshop-media-server-2.com). If you do not have another domain, leave this field blank.
trans-unit.target: Numele celui de al doilea domeniu al magazinului, (de ex. magazinul-meu-media-server-2.ro). Daca nu ai un alt domeniu, lasa campul gol.

trans-unit.source: Notifications are numbered bubbles displayed at the very top of your back office, right next to the shop's name. They display the number of new items since you last clicked on them.
trans-unit.target: Notificarile sunt bule numerotate, afisate in partea de sus a paginii de administrare a magazinului, chiar langa numele magazinului. Acestea arata cate articole noi au aparut de cand ai clicat ultima data pe bule.

trans-unit.source: Okay
trans-unit.target: Bine

trans-unit.source: Once this option is enabled (which is only possible if customers and available quantities are shared among shops), the customer's cart will be shared by all shops in this group. This way, any purchase started in one shop will be able to be completed in another shop from the same group.
trans-unit.target: Dupa activarea acestei optiuni (lucru posibil doar daca stocurile si clientii sunt comuni magazinelor grupului), cosul clientului va fi comun tuturor magazinelor din acest grup. In acest fel, orice sesiune de cumparaturi inceputa in unul din magazinele din grup va putea fi finalizata in oricare din magazinele din acelasi grup.

trans-unit.source: Once this option is enabled, the shops in this group will share customers. If a customer registers in any one of these shops, the account will automatically be available in the others shops of this group.
trans-unit.target: Odata ce aceasta optiune este activata, clientii vor fi comuni tuturor magazinelor din acest grup. Cand un client se inregistreaza in oricare dintre aceste magazine, contul va fi automat disponibil in celelalte magazine din acest grup.

trans-unit.source: Only UTF-8 and ISO 8859-1 encodings are allowed
trans-unit.target: Sunt permise doar codificarile UTF-8 si ISO-8859-1

trans-unit.source: Password should be at least %num% characters long.
trans-unit.target: Parola trebuie sa fie lunga de cel putin %num% caractere.

trans-unit.source: Please ask your hosting provider for "phpMyAdmin" access to your database.
trans-unit.target: Cere furnizorului tau de gazduire acces "phpMyAdmin" pentru la baza ta de date.

trans-unit.source: Port number to use.
trans-unit.target: Numar de acces pentru utilizare.

trans-unit.source: Quick description of the key: who it is for, what permissions it has, etc.
trans-unit.target: Scurta descriere a cheii: pentru ce este, ce permisiuni are, etc.

trans-unit.source: Read more about the CSV format at:
trans-unit.target: Citeste mai multe despre formatul CSV la:

trans-unit.source: Receive an email when the import is complete. It can be useful when handling large files, as the import may take some time.
trans-unit.target: Trimite un mesaj e-mail cand importul este complet. Acesta poate fi util atunci cand importi fisiere mari, de vreme ce importul poate dura destul de mult timp.

trans-unit.source: Scores are integers from 0 to 4.
trans-unit.target: Scorurile sunt numere intregi de la 0 la 4.

trans-unit.source: Select the stores the employee is allowed to access.
trans-unit.target: Selecteaza magazinele la care angajatul are acces.

trans-unit.source: Set "Enable Shop" to "No" in the "Maintenance" page under the "Preferences" menu.
trans-unit.target: Seteaza "Activare magazin" pe "Nu" din pagina de "Mentenanta" din meniul de "Preferinte".

trans-unit.source: Set the amount of hours during which the front office cookies are valid. After that amount of time, the customer will have to log in again.
trans-unit.target: Stabilesti durata in ore a vietii cookie-urilor in magazin. Dupa acest interval de timp, clientul va trebui sa se autentifice din nou.

trans-unit.source: Set the maximum size allowed for attachment files (in megabytes). This value has to be lower than or equal to the maximum file upload allotted by your server (currently: %size% MB).
trans-unit.target: Stabileste dimensiunea maxima pentru fisierele anexate (in megaocteti, MB). Aceasta valoare trebuie sa fie mai mica sau egala cu dimensiunea maxima permisa de serverul tau (valoarea curenta: %size% MB).

trans-unit.source: Severity levels
trans-unit.target: Niveluri de severitate

trans-unit.source: Should be enabled if you want to avoid to store the smarty cache on NFS.
trans-unit.target: Ar trebui sa fie activate daca doresti sa eviti stocarea de cache Smarty pe NFS.

trans-unit.source: Since the selected shop has no main URL, you have to set this URL as the Main URL.
trans-unit.target: Pentru ca magazinul selectat nu are un URL principal, trebuie sa-l setezi pe acesta ca URL principal

trans-unit.source: Some features can be disabled in order to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: Unele caracteristici pot fi dezactivate pentru a imbunatati performanta.

trans-unit.source: The private key starts with -----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----.
trans-unit.target: Cheia privata incepe cu -----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----.

trans-unit.source: The selected shop already has a Main URL. Therefore, if you set this one as the Main URL, the older Main URL will be set as a regular URL.
trans-unit.target: Magazinul selectat are deja o adresa URL principala. Prin urmare, daca o setezi pe aceasta ca principala, cea veche va fi deveni secundara.

trans-unit.source: This feature allows you to identify modules that might be causing bugs on your store. Disable all non-built-in modules (not listed in composer.json). Then, re-enable each module one by one and check that everything works properly before moving on to the next one.
trans-unit.target: Aceasta functie iti permite sa identifici modulele care ar putea cauza erori in magazinul tau. Dezactiveaza toate modulele externe (nu sunt listate in composer.json). Apoi, reactiveaza fiecare modul unul cate unul si verifica daca totul functioneaza corect inainte de a trece la urmatorul.

trans-unit.source: This is the physical folder for your store on the web server. Leave this field empty if your store is installed on the root path. For instance, if your store is available at www.example.com/my-store/, you must input my-store/ in this field.
trans-unit.target: Folderul fizic al magazinului pe serverul web. Lasa campul gol daca magazinul este instalat in radacina. De exemplu, daca magazinul este disponibil la www.magazin.ro/magazin/, se introduce magazin/ in acest camp.

trans-unit.source: This page will be displayed just after login.
trans-unit.target: Acesta pagina va fi afisata doar dupa autentificare.

trans-unit.source: This will add directives to your .htaccess file, which should improve caching and compression.
trans-unit.target: Aceasta va adauga directive in fisierul .htaccess care ar trebui sa imbunatateasca folosirea de cache si compresia.

trans-unit.source: URL rewriting must be activated on your server to use this feature.
trans-unit.target: Pentru a folosi aceasta facilitate, rescrierea adreselor URL trebuie sa fie activata pe server.

trans-unit.source: Unless you enabled the "Drop existing tables" option, you must delete all tables from your current database.
trans-unit.target: Doar daca nu ai activat optiunea "Drop existing tables (Renunta la tabelele curente)", trebuie sa stergi toate tabelele din baza ta de date curenta.

trans-unit.source: Use this option to associate data (products, modules, etc.) the same way for each selected shop.
trans-unit.target: Foloseste aceasta optiune pentru a asocia date (produse, module, etc) in acelasi fel pentru fiecare magazin selectat.

trans-unit.source: Warning
trans-unit.target: Atentie

trans-unit.source: Warning: Enabling the "share customers" and "share orders" options is not recommended. Once activated and orders are created, you will not be able to disable these options. If you need these options, we recommend using several categories rather than several shops.
trans-unit.target: Atentie: nu este recomandata activarea "Clienti comuni" si "Comenzi comune". Odata ce sunt activate si sunt create comenzi, nu vei mai putea dezactiva aceste optiuni. Daca aceste optiuni sunt necesare, iti recomandam sa folosesti categorii in loc de magazine.

trans-unit.source: Warning: URL rewriting (e.g. mod_rewrite for Apache) seems to be disabled. If your Virtual URL doesn't work, please check with your hosting provider on how to activate URL rewriting.
trans-unit.target: Atentie: Rescrierea URL-ului (de ex. mod_rewrite pentru Apache) pare sa fie dezactivata. Daca URL-ul tau virtual nu functioneaza, verifica cu gazda site-ului tau pentru cai de activare a rescrierii de URL-uri.

trans-unit.source: Warning: You will not be able to disable this option once you've started to accept orders.
trans-unit.target: Atentie: nu vei putea dezactiva aceasta optiune odata ce ai inceput sa acceptati comenzi.

trans-unit.source: Warning: you will not be able to disable this option once you have registered customers.
trans-unit.target: Atentie: nu vei putea dezactiva aceasta optiune odata ce ai clienti inregistrati.

trans-unit.source: When you access your back office and decide to stay logged in, your cookies lifetime defines your browser session. Set here the number of hours during which you want them valid before logging in again.
trans-unit.target: Cand accesezi interfata de administrare (BO) si decizi sa ramai conectat, vei ramane conectat pana cand expira cookie-urile. Seteaza aici intervalul de ore de validitate pentru cookie-uri, interval dupa care va trebui sa te autentifici din nou.

trans-unit.source: Where customers send messages from the order page.
trans-unit.target: Unde clientii trimit mesaje din pagina de comanda.

trans-unit.source: You can also export the query results as a CSV file by clicking on the "%export_label%" button
trans-unit.target: De asemenea, poti exporta rezultatul interogarii ca fisier CSV facand clic pe butonul "%export_label%"

trans-unit.source: You can also upload your file via FTP to the following directory: %s .
trans-unit.target: Fisierul se poate incarca si via FTP in urmatorul director: %s.

trans-unit.source: You can read information on import at:
trans-unit.target: Poti citi informatii despre import la:

trans-unit.source: You can then view the query results by clicking on the "%view_label%" action in the dropdown menu
trans-unit.target: Poti vedea rezultatul interogarii facand clic pe actiunea "%view_label%" din meniul derulant

trans-unit.source: You can use this option if you want to create a store with a URL that doesn't exist on your server (e.g. if you want your store to be available with the URL www.example.com/my-store/shoes/, you have to set shoes/ in this field, assuming that my-store/ is your Physical URL).
trans-unit.target: Poti folosi aceasta optiune daca doresti sa creezi un magazin cu un URL care nu exista pe serverul tau (de ex. daca doresti ca magazinul sa fie disponibil cu URL-ul www.magazinul-meu.ro/magazin/pantofi/, pune pantofi/ in acest camp, daca magazin/ este URL-ul fizic).

trans-unit.source: You cannot set this parameter to No when combinations are already used by some of your products
trans-unit.target: Nu poti alege valoarea Nu pentru acest parametru atat timp cat exista combinatii in uzul produselor tale

trans-unit.source: e.g. Blouse; red.jpg, blue.jpg, green.jpg; 129.90
trans-unit.target: de ex. Bluza; rosie.jpg, albastra.jpg, verde.jpg; 129.90

trans-unit.source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comma-separated_values
trans-unit.target: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comma-separated_values

trans-unit.source: or
trans-unit.target: sau
